mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tickets (expiration_date, total_quantity, remaining_quantity, category, user_id, store_id) VALUES(#{exexpirationDate}, #{totalQuantity}, #{remainingQuantity}, #{category}, #{userId}, #{storeId})
mapper.update: UPDATE tickets SET `remaining_quantity` = CASE WHEN category = 0 THEN `remaining_quantity` - 1 ELSE `remaining_quantity` END WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId}
UPDATE tickets SET `remaining_quantity` = CASE WHEN category = 0 THEN `remaining_quantity` + 1 ELSE `remaining_quantity` END WHERE ticket_id = #{ticketId}
